price: [Adorar a Dios] la noche de la predestinación es superior en recompensa a hacerlo durante mil meses.
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
